keyMoments.title: Luffy Climbs Drum Rockies for His Crew
keyMoments.description: Luffy demonstrates the lengths he'll go to save his crewmates by climbing the near-vertical Drum Rockies for three hours while carrying Nami and Sanji.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most iconic displays of Luffy's dedication to his crew and his role as captain.

keyMoments.title: Zoro Protects Drum Island Citizens
keyMoments.description: Zoro defeats Wapol's soldiers at Bighorn to help save Dalton, showing the crew's willingness to help others.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Straw Hats' heroic nature and commitment to helping those in need.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

keyMoments.title: Wapol's Crew Attacks Luffy
keyMoments.description: Wapol and his subordinates Chess and Kuromarimo intercept and attack Luffy while he's carrying his injured crewmates.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's cruel nature in attacking someone who cannot defend themselves.

keyMoments.title: Wapol's Soldiers Defeated at Bighorn
keyMoments.description: Wapol's soldiers are defeated by Zoro at Bighorn village after gloating over Dalton's burial.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's weakening grip on Drum Island.
